GSD.description:
media: pvrusb2: fix memory leak in pvr_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit 466b67c0543b2ae67814d053f6e29b39be6b33bb. For more details please see the references link.
